summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 8235, entitled "An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Galer Street, from Fourth Avenue North to Nob Hill Avenue; Galer Street, from Seventh Avenue West to Eleventh Avenue West; Garfield Street, from Fifth Avenue North to Eleventh Avenue West; Hayes Street, from Fourth Avenue North to First Avenue North; Blaine Street, from Fourth Avenue North to Eleventh Avenue West; Fourth Avenue North, from Galer Street to Blaine Street; Nob Hill Avenue, from Galer Street to Blaine Street; Third Avenue North, from Galer Street to Blaine Street; Second Avenue North, from Galer Street to Blaine Street; Warren Avenue, from Garfield Street to Blaine Street; First Avenue North, from Galer Street to Blaine Street; First Avenue West, from Garfield Street to Blaine Street; Second Avenue West from Garfield Street to Blaine Street; Fifth Avenue West from Garfield Street to Blaine Street; Sixth Avenue West, from Galer Street to Blaine Street; Seventh Avenue West, from Galer Street to Blaine Street, Eighth Avenue West and southerly extension thereof, from Olympic Place to Blaine Street, by grading the same, in accordance with Resolution No. 645, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by an act of the Legislature of the State of Washington, entitled "An act authorizing the issuance and sale of bonds by cities, to pay for local improvements, providing for the payment thereof, and declaring an emergency," approved March 14, 1899, and Ordinance No. 5693 of said City, approved December 6, 1899.
